title: Our century: invaders
creator_credit: Nine Network, Australian Film Commission, Film Australia, National Film and Sound Archive of Australia, Will Davies, Mark Hamlyn and Alec Morgan
brief_description: This episode from ‘Our Century’ and hosted by Ray Martin examines the infestations that have cursed Australia since white settlement. It covers issues such as why some animals and insects were introduced and how we now deal with their devastating effects on the environment.
creator_credit_for_label: Nine Network, Australian Film Commission, Film Australia, National Film and Sound Archive of Australia, Will Davies, Mark Hamlyn and Alec Morgan
